Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Setting up the environment to run node end-to-end tests against fabric, fabric-cop
Issue.description: To run the node end-to-end tests against the latest images of fabric-peer, fabric-orderer, fabric-cop, ccenv as part of functional integrating testing, develop a script to automate the entire process. Docker-compose file will be used to launch the network using the latest images of components and run the end-to-end tests against the network. Docker-compose file should be good enough to support power, z, x86 environments.
